# Fulfulde Stopwords - Adamawa Variant
# Version: 1.0.0
# License: MIT
#
# This list contains common stopwords for the Fulfulde language (Adamawa variant),
# compiled for Natural Language Processing applications.
#
# Categories:
# - Personal pronouns
# - Demonstratives
# - Prepositions
# - Conjunctions
# - Particles
# - Negations
# - Interrogatives
# - Auxiliaries

# Pronoms personnels (Personal pronouns)
mi
miɗo
min
miin
yam
am
a
aɗa
an
aan
ma
o
omo
kanko
mo
ɗum
ɓe
ɓeɗo
kamɓe
ɗi
en
enen
on
onon

# Pronoms réfléchis (Reflexive pronouns)
hoore
mun

# Démonstratifs / référentiels (Demonstratives)
ɗo
ɗon
oo
ɓee
ɗoo
toon
o'o

# Déterminants / quantificateurs faibles (Determiners / weak quantifiers)
gooto
feere
fuu
pat
koo
ɗuuɗɗum
seɗɗa

# Prépositions (Prepositions)
haa
e
nder
dow
ley
bee
walaa
ngam
hakkunde
haa e

# Conjonctions de coordination (Coordinating conjunctions)
bee
e
koo
ammaa
ngam

# Conjonctions de subordination (Subordinating conjunctions)
niai
dow
nde
to
mbe
bana

# Auxiliaires et verbes grammaticalisés (Auxiliaries and grammaticalized verbs)
woni
ɗon
woodi
jogi
waɗugo

# Particules discursives (Discourse particles)
nden
ni
boo
tan
kam
dey
kadi
le
nii

# Négations (Negations)
ai
ataa
naa
fay
huunde
meere
abada

# Relatifs et interrogatifs (Relatives and interrogatives)
mo
ko
moy
ɗume
ndeeye
toy
noy
ngam ɗume

# Adverbes temps / lieu (Time and place adverbs)
ɗoo
toon
jonta
hande
hanki
jaango

# Modalité (Modality)
tawan
goonga

# Intensité (Intensity)
masin
ɗuuɗi
seda

# Comparaison / similarité (Comparison / similarity)
ɓuri
famɗi
reeta
ɓuraayi
pooti
fodde
bana
hano

# Présentatifs / déictiques (Presentatives / deictics)
ee
don

# Temps et aspect - particules verbales (Tense and aspect markers)
don
no
ma
yalla

# Politesse / interjections (Politeness / interjections)
usoko
bismillah
a'aa
ii
ooho

# Pronoms de classes nominales (Nominal class pronouns)
ɗum
ka
ki
ko
nde
ndi
ndu
nge
ngi
ngu
nga
ngol
ɗe
ɗi

# Focus et emphase (Focus and emphasis)
nia
tigin
fey

# Connecteurs supplémentaires (Additional connectors)
heɓi
wala
sey
koo dume
koo moy

# Particules interrogatives (Interrogative particles)
na
koo

# Formes verbales fusionnées fréquentes (Common fused verbal forms)
miɗo
aɗa
omo
enɗon
onɗon
ɓeɗon
mino
ano
imo
enno
onno
ɓeno
